Experiment Method.Assay Method: Inducible expression model and inhibitor assays

Material used.Description: Inducible expression model in PC12/TetOn cells was used to study alpha-synuclein expression and its effects on macroautophagy and proteasome inhibition.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Gain-of-function (increased toxicity in proteasome inhibition context)
Readout description.Result Description: At low expression, no toxicity; increased expression led to differential effects on macroautophagy and proteasome inhibition. 3-MA and MG132 inhibition showed distinct responses in mutant vs. wild-type alpha-synuclein.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.
